pages.text: $(li)The Honey Wand is a useful tool for the beekeping.$(br)$(li)Just click a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/beehive)Beehive$(/l) or a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/bee_nest)Bee Nest$(/l) that is full of honey while you are holding a Honey Wand in your hand to obtain a Sticky Honey Wand.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/apiarist)Apiarist$(/l) will exchange your $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) by a Honey Wand.
